latex.formula: \alpha\langle\nabla f(x_k), x_k - x_{k+1}\rangle \leq f(x_k) - f(x_{k+1}), \quad \beta\langle\nabla f(x_k), x_k - x_{k+1}\rangle \geq f(x_k) - f(x_{k+1})
latex.notes: NOTATION ISSUE: Nesterov's book uses PARENTHESES for inner products: (âˆ‡f(x_k), x_k - x_{k+1}), but citation uses angle brackets \langle\rangle. The formulas are mathematically equivalent but notation differs. Citation also references equation (1.2.20) which is a separate descent inequality on page 50.

issues: NOTATION MISMATCH: Book uses parentheses ( , ) for inner products but citation uses \langle\rangle. Mathematically equivalent.
EQUATION NUMBER: Citation mentions (1.2.20) but Armijo rule is (1.2.16)-(1.2.17). Citation is composite of multiple equations.
